WelcomePage.title: Take control of your messages with Heyo
WelcomePage.subtitle: A truly private messaging app built on a decentralized technology, secured by CorePass.

sliders.title001:
One account 
 for all your services
sliders.subtitle001:
Keep your valuable data safely stored 
 and quickly accesible from one place.
sliders.title002:
Assurance that you've 
 got the right person
sliders.subtitle002:
Know the person you are connecting with 
 and how your data is being used.
sliders.subtitle003:
Each time your data gets requested, you 
 earn an income. Your identity becomes 
 your saving and spending tool.
sliders.title004:
Keep your earnings 
 in a safe place
sliders.subtitle004:
CorePass comes with an integrated 
 cryptocurrency wallet to keep your 
 savings safe and secure.

BenefitsPage.footer: Your data will be safely verified by

PINcodePage.title: Set PIN
PINcodePage.subtitle: Set a 6 digit PIN code to protect your Heyo application
PINcodePage.dialogTitle: Add an extra layer to your security

PersonalizationPage.title: Choose your chat name
PersonalizationPage.subtitle: All users will see only your CoreID and a readable name that can’t be changed.

RecoveryMethodPage.title: How do you want to back up your account?

firstOption.title: Offline, using recovery phrase
firstOption.subtitle: A 24 word phrase will be generated. We highly recommend you to write these words down on paper and store them in a safe offline place.

SecondOption.title: Digitally, using private key
SecondOption.subtitle: Your CoreID account can be recovered with a private key which you will have to protect with a password and store.

emptyState.title: It looks empty here
emptyState.subtitle: Start with inviting your friends or start new chats

emptyState.title: You have no calls
emptyState.subtitle: Call someone from your contact list by hitting that + button

recordCallDialog.title: This call will be recorded
recordCallDialog.subtitle: Other participants on this call will receive a notification about you recording this call. It is up to them whether they allow or deny it.

ShareableQrPage.scanQrTitle: Scan your QR code with people so they can add you and start chatting.

NewCallPage.emptyStateContactsTitle: You don’t have any contacts to call with. You can search for new users or invite them.

newChat.emptyStateTitleContacts:
You don’t have any contacts yet. 
 You can invite them now.

MessagesPage.endToEndEncryptedMessaging: Any messages you exchange are fully encrypted and can only be read by you and @name

bottomSheet.locationAccessDisclaimer: We will access your location only for the duration you chosen and you can stop sharing it any time. We won’t use your location for any purpose other than sharing it in this chat.
bottomSheet.shareLiveLocationWith: Share my live location with @name for:

AddContacts.AddNicknameSubtitle:
Nickname help you to identify others. Only you can 
see this nickname.

Permissions.capturePhotos:
To capture photos and videos, you need to allow Heyo access to 
 your device’s photos, 
 media and files.
Permissions.camera:
To capture photos and videos, you need to 
 allow Heyo access to your camera.
Permissions.location: To share location, you need to allow Heyo access to your device's location.
